resources.string: I would like to share Awesome app that helps to find your phone location
You need to give number of permissions to this app to find your phone locations when you miss it, please select remember always
This app need to access to your location and SMS to enable you to find your phone without internet

This app allows you to find your phone using your friends or family phones, so you have to select list of peoples who you want to allow them to find your phone, and list of peoples who you will find them, Also you could find you phone from any device that do not have this app by sending SMS contains your personal password to your phone.
Find location is Denied, we cannot find your phone
s phone send its location,If he select you in his list of who could find me, you will get his location in 10 sec
Please setup the trust number from setting
Please help me. I am here
See current location for list of phones that you track
Ask for help from your friends who you trust. The system will send them your current location with emergency message.
Manage the people who could find you, and who you could find
List of people Who Could Find Me ?
List of people Who Could I Find ?
by using this Password you could find your phone by send sms contain this code from any device
Other Phone send his location, now open your notification and see his location
You need to add list of people who you could find to track them.\n Do you want to add now.
Do you want to tell him by SMS that you added his phone number in your app
